document.heading: Voter Registration Access And Modernization Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-158, the “Voter Registration Access And Modernization Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-264. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 14, 2014, and Sept. 23, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Oct. 7, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-437 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-158 became effective on Feb. 26, 2015.
